messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell?
ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell is a simple node for sharing latent image size between nodes in ComfyUI.

To install ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell, use the CLI to go to the ComfyUI folder, then navigate to the 'custom_nodes' directory. Clone the repository using 'git clone https://github.com/modusCell/ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell.git' and start or restart ComfyUI.
What is the main functionality of the ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell?
The main functionality of the ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell is to share latent image size between nodes in ComfyUI.
In which directory should you clone the ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell repository?
You should clone the ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell repository in the 'custom_nodes' directory within the ComfyUI folder.
Is it necessary to restart ComfyUI after installing ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell?
Yes, it is necessary to start or restart ComfyUI after installing ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell.
What is the main benefit of using ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell?
The main benefit of using ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell is that it simplifies the process of sharing latent image size between nodes in ComfyUI.
Who is the creator or maintainer of ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell?
The creator or maintainer of ComfyUI-dimension-node-modusCell is modusCell, as indicated by the repository URL.
